Introduction
This topic contains information on processing final expense deductions, including
period to deduct final expenses
example 1 of the general rule for deducting final expenses
example 2 of the general rule for deducting final expenses
example 3 of the final expenses paid during the calendar year following the year of death
example 4 of the final expenses paid by the surviving spouse before the Veteran’s death
example 5 of the final expenses paid by the surviving spouse after the Veteran’s death but before the date of pension entitlement
example 6 of the final expenses paid by the surviving spouse before the Veteran’s death and during the calendar year following the year of death
final expenses paid from joint accounts
, and
reimbursed final expenses
.
